title: Your GTA$ Gift
headline: Your GTA$ Gift
subtitle: Your GTA$1,000,000 Has Been Deposited
content:
Your GTA$1,000,000 gift for playing GTA Online between November 12th and 18th has been deposited into your Maze Bank Account.

For obliterating the GTA$100 Billion challenge last week, everyone will receive a special new vehicle during launch week of the next big GTA Online update in December as a reward for your communal efforts. In addition, all participants who played last week will receive a special badge of honor.

Stay tuned to the Rockstar Newswire for more updates to come.
